member.name: T:ATT.Controls.AttControl
member.summary: Abstract Base class for all AT&T API controls.

member.name: F:ATT.Controls.AttControl.EndpointProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Endpoint dependency property - the base URL for the REST API to access. Defaults to https://api.att.com which is working as of September 2012.

member.name: F:ATT.Controls.AttControl.ApiKeyProperty
member.summary: Identifies the ApiKey dependency property.

member.name: F:ATT.Controls.AttControl.SecretKeyProperty
member.summary: Identifies the SecretKey dependency property.

member.name: P:ATT.Controls.AttControl.Endpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets Endpoint for ATT services - the base URL for the REST API to access. Defaults to https://api.att.com which is working as of September 2012.

member.name: P:ATT.Controls.AttControl.ApiKey
member.summary: Gets or sets ApiKey for access to ATT services. If you do not set an ApiKey, the software will default to the value set with the global static ATTSettings.ApiKey.

member.name: P:ATT.Controls.AttControl.SecretKey
member.summary: Gets or sets SecretKey for access to ATT services. If you do not set an ApiKey, the software will default to the value set with the global static ATTSettings.SecretKey.

member.name: P:ATT.Controls.AttControl.ApiKeyConfigured
member.summary: Returns true if API key is configured; false else.

member.name: P:ATT.Controls.AttControl.SecretKeyConfigured
member.summary: Returns true if secret key is configured; false else.

member.name: T:ATT.Controls.AttSettings
member.summary: Connection setting for AT&T SDK. If you would like to use multiple controls and set the values in one place, you may use the ATTSettings static class.

member.summary: Gets or sets API key.

member.name: P:ATT.Controls.AttSettings.SecretKey
member.summary: Gets or sets Secret key.

member.summary: Class that can save and load mms into a local file

member.name: M:ATT.Controls.LocalFileMmsStorage.GetMmsMessages(System.String)
member.summary: Loads MMS messages collection from local storage.
member.param: A short code is an alternate phone number you can use instead of a phone number. This way your computer can receive messages as if it were a phone. Learn more about short codes, or get one, at developer.att.com.
member.returns: List of loaded MMS messages collection.

members.member:
Saves MMS into storage.
List of MMS.. A short code is an alternate phone number you can use instead of a phone number. This way your computer can receive messages as if it were a phone. Learn more about short codes, or get one, at developer.att.com.

member.name: T:ATT.Controls.SmsControl
member.summary: Use this control for sending SMS messages up to four kilobytes in length.

member.name: F:ATT.Controls.SmsControl.MaxSmsLengthProperty
member.summary: The max SMS length property, if not set explicitly, will be defined as 4096 bytes (4K).

member.name: M:ATT.Controls.SmsControl.InitializePresenter
member.summary: Creates and initializes presenter instance for SMS control.

member.name: P:ATT.Controls.SmsControl.MaxSmsLength
member.summary: The Max length, in bytes, of an SMS to be sent. You can use this to limit the message length for user interface reasons. Defaults to 4K, which is the AT&T network limit as of August 2012. If, in the future, that limit changes, you can explicitly set a higher length with this variable.
